sentence: My partner and I celebrate New Year in the Rancho Mirage area and had one of the best new year celebration the hotel has a great location close to restaurants and bars the view from the hotel was outstanding overlooking the snow mountains
Rooms have been renovated and are perfect for up to 4 people
On last 2 visits room was overlooking golf course with views of the mountain
We stayed in a 2nd floor villa we had wifi beautiful room great bed and glorious AC
There rooms floir plan is spacious and equipped with a little kitchen it includes stovetop dishwasher refrigerator kitchen utensils and a few small appliances
The unit was well equipped with newer appliances and my children were able to sleep three deep in the queen sized bed
Great space great bed clean rooms
Sun loungers are good quality and free towels are issued from the games room which also has pool tables and table tennis
Over all a very pleasant stay especially for a price that was less than many hotel rooms
The rooms are comfortable it is always been quiet despite the fact there are families with small children
From the cheesy pool cafe to the neglected activity center the cockroach we found in the room
Some items in room need update
Rooms are pretty dated carpets are old and worn out
The unit above us had young children and the noise from banging doors and the kids running all over for hous was too much
The unit was clean but they never told me they changed your towels out mid week which would have been nice
Our ground floor unit 507 was facing the parking lot and street so we did n’t sit outside much

This can not be a Welks Resort it really needs improving I understand all resorts have fees but this was not worth it not once that our room get cleaned and yes we remove the paper from the door the TV in the living room was not working it kept saying no signal when I called customer service on the phone no one answered and the view from our balcony it is not the same as what they have on their pictures it is not a golf course but a sand dunes for off roading either it was a lake or Pond or of golf course it just looks bad
Check in was at 4 pm we waited until 5 pm and the room still was not ready

Again just being bratty because I am comparing against Welks San Diego and my other timeshare I own they did not have a real dining restaurant on site adult pool was as basic as it gets and somehow my reservation had stated that we requested an ADA disabled room which we did not
This hotel is run down the pool is dirty the rec room is dirty and this experience was horrible
